data.name: Skeleton Crew Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Enjoy the exciting music of Skeleton Crew through this soundtrack from composer Richard Wilkinson. Experience the highs and lows across 29 tracks, ranging from the upbeat melodies of Cannonball Fun to the dramatic tones of The Hooded Carrion.
data.about_the_game: Enjoy the exciting music of Skeleton Crew through this soundtrack from composer Richard Wilkinson. Experience the highs and lows across 29 tracks, ranging from the upbeat melodies of Cannonball Fun to the dramatic tones of The Hooded Carrion.
data.short_description: This is additional content for https://store.steampowered.com/app/1145330/Skeleton_Crew/, but does not include the base game.
